text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly addresses the scenario where the German Distributor attempts to file in court. Under Section I.1.A, it states that German courts, due to the New York Convention and ZPO ยง 1032, 'must decline jurisdiction' if an arbitration defense is raised.
